metadata.title: CVE-2024-10383 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in the gitlab-web-ide-vscode-fork componentdistributed over CDN affecting all versions prior to1.89.1-1.0.0-dev-20241118094343and used by all versions of GitLab CE/EEstarting from 15.11 prior to 17.3 and which also temporarily affectedversions 17.4, 17.5 and 17.6, where a XSS attack was possible when loading.ipynb files in the web IDE

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
